SELECT a.* FROM sys_menu a
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_role_user b INNER JOIN sys_role_menu c ON b.role_id=c.role_id WHERE a.menu_id=c.menu_id AND b.user_id=#{userId})
AND a.status = #{status}
AND a.edit_mode = #{editMode}
AND cascade_id LIKE '%${cascadeId}%'
AND menu_name LIKE '%${menuName}%'
AND menu_code LIKE '%${menuCode}%'
ORDER BY LENGTH(a.cascade_id) ASC,a.sort_no ASC
SELECT DISTINCT c.menu_id FROM sys_role_user b INNER JOIN sys_role_menu c ON b.role_id=c.role_id WHERE b.user_id=#{userId}
SELECT xzq as typeCode,dm AS itemCode,mc as itemName FROM t_jzdm WHERE sfzx='0' AND xzq=#{xzq}
SELECT jz as typeCode,dm AS itemCode,mc as itemName FROM t_jwhdm WHERE sfzx='0' AND jz=#{jz}
SELECT jz as typeCode,dm AS itemCode,mc as itemName FROM t_pcsdm WHERE sfzx='0' AND jz=#{jz}
SELECT xzq as typeCode,jddm AS itemCode,jdmc as itemName FROM t_jddm WHERE sfzx='0' AND jddm=#{jddm}
